text: I (vspomnite), kak My skazali vam: "Vy v etom gorode selites' I tam vkushayte vse sebe v usladu, No govorite: "Proshcheniya (proshu u Boga) I oblegcheniya (ot pregresheniy)!" I vo vrata yego vstupite, Smirenno prekloniv koleni, I My prostim vam vashi pregreshen'ya I uvelichim dolyu tem, kto delayet dobro
